title: Development of a Digital-Based Learning System for Sight-Singing Proficiency Improvement

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Establishing a self-directed learning environment using digital devices, including applied tasks linked to music theory

learning_goals: Students can sight-read four-part scores with over 80% accuracy
Learners can reproduce complex rhythmic patterns at the sixteenth-note level with 90% accuracy
Beginners achieve a 40% improvement in pitch discrimination ability within three months using digital tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
